parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Math - Vectors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns Euclidean distance between two 3D vectors or two 3D positions.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vector1 [[vectorDistance]] vector2

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vector1: [[Array]] in format [x,y,z] or [[Position3D]] or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0)

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vector2: [[Array]] in format [x,y,z] or [[Position3D]] or 2D (since Arma 3 v1.99.146539, z coordinate is defaulted to 0)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_euclideanDist = [[getPosASL]] [[player]] [[vectorDistance]] [0,0,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>([[getPosASL]] _a) [[vectorDistance]] ([[getPosASL]] _b);
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>same as</value></part></template>
([[getPosATL]] _a) [[distance]] ([[getPosATL]] _b);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vectorAdd]], [[vectorDiff]], [[vectorCrossProduct]], [[vectorDotProduct]], [[vectorCos]], [[vectorMagnitude]], [[vectorMagnitudeSqr]], [[vectorMultiply]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDir]], [[setVectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]], [[distance]], [[vectorNormalized]], [[vectorFromTo]], [[distance2D]], [[matrixMultiply]], [[matrixTranspose]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 28 Jun, 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5| ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<template lineStart="1"><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.22</value></part></template> Algorithm:
<code>Vector1 = [x1,y1,z1];
Vector2 = [x2,y2,z2];
Result = [[sqrt]] ((x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2);
</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
